metadata.description: Meeednight Pulp Presents, Steve Niles's renaissance of horror pulp fiction for a modern age, continues with The Lurkers. Los Angeles detective Jack Dietz is having one of the worst days of his life. One body is bad enough, but when another turns up with human bite marks, he knows his world has just turned inside out. Hector Casanova provides art for this hard-bitten chiller.
metadata.name: Lurkers
